name: Graywalkers: Purgatory RPG
blurb: An Emergent Strategic & Tactical Turn-Based RPG set in a Supernatural Post-Apocalyptic World where Heaven & Hell merged with Earth

rewards.reward: No Reward
FRIEND: Our undying gratitude for your support! Thank you!
BACKER: Exclusive Graywalkers Wallpapers for PC & Mobile + Credits on the Site as Backer... and everything in lower pledges that apply
CITIZEN:  Digital Download Copy of the Game + Digital Manual + Credits in the Game as Kickstarter Backer....and everything in lower pledges that apply
SURVIVOR:  Digital Comic Book + Graywalkers Mobile App for iOS & Android (Premium Edition) ...and everything in lower pledges that apply
TRAVELLER: Digital Novella + Digital Soundtrack ...and everything in lower pledges that apply
ADVENTURER: Physical Boxed  Copy of the Game + Digital Art Book +  Graywalkers Screensaver ...and everything in lower pledges that apply

GRAYWALKER: Graywalkers T-Shirt Design#2 + Physical Player Strategy Guide + In-Game Starter Pack (Gold) + Limited Edition Digital Poster Print (Signed) +  Extra Digital Copy of the Game (4 Total) + Concept Art Digital Print (Signed) ......and everything in lower pledges that apply

ANGEL: Alpha Game Access + Graywalkers T-shrit Design #3 + In-game Starter Pack (Sapphire) + Physical Copy of Graywalkers Tabletop RPG Rules Set + + Graywalkers Over the Chest Body Bag + Extra Digital Download (5 Total) of Game + Extra Limited Edition Boxed Game (signed) (3 Total) ...and everything in lower pledges that apply

CHERUBIM: Credits Title as Game Developer or Game Designer (Your Choice) + Graywalkers Grab Bag + Access to an Exclusive Recruit + In-Game Starter Pack (Ruby) + Design or Become a Minor NPC in the game + Free Shipping of Rewards + Access to exclusive Outfit Set, Weapon Set and Item Set + Extra Digital Download Copy of the Game (6 Total) + Extra Limited Edition Boxed Game (4 Total)...and everything in lower pledges that apply

SERAPHIM:  Credits Title as Assistant Producer + Get your face on an in-game Billboard/Poster + Name an Establishment + Exclusive Graywalkers Jacket + Design Custom Weapon + Custom Outfit Set + Design Custom Item + In-Game Starter Pack (Diamond) + Invitation to the Launch Parties in Las Vegas & Manila (Travel & Accomodations not included)  +  Extra Digital Download Copy of the Game (7 total) + Extra Limited Edition Boxed Game (Signed) (5 Total) ...and everything in lower pledges that apply

ARCHANGEL:  Credits Title of Producer + Graywalkers Backpack (Basic) + Shrine of You in Game + Name a Major NPC (Non-Combat) \r\n + Design an Epic Outfit Set + Design an Epic Weapon Set + Design an Epic Item Set + One time Roundtable Meeting with the Team (via Skype) to share your ideas directly + Character Portrait Collection Digtial Prints + In-game Starter Pack (Titanium) + Extra Digital Download of Game (8 Total) + Extra Limited Edition Boxed Game (Signed) (6 Total) ...and everything in lower pledges that apply

CREATOR: Credit Title as Senior Game Designer or Senior Executive Producer (your choice) + Design a Mission + Design an Epic Reward for your Designed Mission + Be or Design a Playable Character Recruit "Potential"  + Design a Major Villain in the Game + Design an Elite Adventuring Group (Neutral or Enemy) + Signed Concept Art Digital Prints for all Your Designs + Signed Poster Print of your designed Character + In-Game Starter Pack (Orichalcum) + Skype Meeting with Design Team once every 4 months till launch + Spend a Weekend with us in Las Vegas or a week in Manila.(Travel & Accomodations not included)  We do guarantee to  give you a grand time while hanging out with us, working with us and playing with us + Exclusive Dreamlords Digital Team Jacket & T-Shirt + Modular Backpack with complete attachment set + Extra Limited Edition Boxed Game (Signed) (10 Total) + Extra Digital Download Copy of the Game (10 Total)  ...and everything in lower pledges that apply
